description: Stream Live IPTV, Video On-Demand, and Series from an Xtream-compatible server using this plugin. Includes flat series view and flat VOD view features to show all content directly without category folders.
name: Jellyfin Xtream (Flat View)
overview: Stream content from an Xtream-compatible server with flat series and VOD view.

versions.changelog:
## v0.9.5.3 - Fix malformed JSON from Xtream API

**Fixes:**
- Handle cases where Xtream API returns JSON array instead of object for series data
- Prevents cache failures for series with malformed API responses
- Better error logging for JSON deserialization failures

**Effect:**
- Series that previously failed to cache now load successfully with empty data
- Cache refresh completes without errors

**Full Features in this fork:**
- Flat Series View - show all series in single alphabetical list
- Flat VOD View - show all movies in single alphabetical list  
- Eager caching - pre-load all series data for instant navigation
- Unicode pipe tag parsing - strip ┃NL┃ style tags from titles
